mapper.select: SELECT CONR_TGT_NO /* prConrSetInfo.getConrTgtNoList */ FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND DPTH_NO = '2'

SELECT /* prConrSetInfo.getPrConrSetInfo */ CONR_NO , CONR_TGT_NO , CONR_TGT_CNT , DISP_SEQ , DPTH_NO , UPR_CONR_TGT_NO FROM PR_CONR_TGT_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNo} AND DPTH_NO = '2'

SELECT /* prConrSetInfo.getConrTgtCdList_setY */ PCSI.CONR_TGT_NO , FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',PCTI.CONR_TGT_CD) AS CONR_TGT_NAME , PCTI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCTI.CONR_TGT_CNT FROM PR_CONR_SET_INFO PCSI , PR_CONR_TGT_INFO PCTI WHERE PCSI.CONR_NO = PCTI.CONR_NO AND PCSI.CONR_TGT_NO = PCTI.CONR_TGT_NO AND PCSI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCSI.UPR_CONR_TGT_NO = #{conrTgtNo} AND PCSI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCSI.DPTH_NO = '2' ORDER BY PCSI.DISP_SEQ

SELECT /* prConrSetInfo.getConrTgtCdList_setN */ PCSI.CONR_TGT_NO , FN_GET_CODENAME('DP005',PCTI.CONR_TGT_CD) AS CONR_TGT_NAME , PCTI.CONR_TGT_CD , PCTI.CONR_TGT_CNT FROM PR_CONR_SET_INFO PCSI , PR_CONR_TGT_INFO PCTI WHERE PCSI.CONR_NO = PCTI.CONR_NO AND PCSI.CONR_TGT_NO = PCTI.CONR_TGT_NO AND PCSI.CONR_NO = #{conrNo} AND PCSI.DISP_CTG_NO = #{dispCtgNo} AND PCSI.DPTH_NO = '2' ORDER BY PCSI.DISP_SEQ
